Organization of Lamia modules¶

The purpose of this page is to understand the global organization of the code.

Lamia.api¶

This module contains all modules to interact with the Lamia database.

Submodules are :

Lamia.api.dbasemanager¶

This module manage interactions with database (creation, reading, offlinemode…)

Lamia.api.libs¶

This module contains all external libs needed by Lamia.

Lamia.api.libslamia¶

This module contains all lamia libs for processing the data

Lamia.arteliasite¶

This module contains the django lamia web site

Lamia.config¶

This module contains all the settings to adapt Lamia to a particular thematic (levee, urbandrainage…)

Lamia.doc¶

This module contains the sphinx documentation

Lamia.qgisiface¶

This module contains all the modules for the Qgis software User Interface

Lamia.test¶

All unit tests
